icon_section.block_text: Our tools and metrics will provide you a detailed analysis of your portfolio to help you craft better trades and learn from your mistakes as well as providing a detailed history of your trades.
Real-time stock data is pulled from the markets so you can execute your trades at lightning speeds and stay up to date with the latest stock prices.

Use our platform to craft trading algorithms that will let you compete against other users and the markets themselves. Use any programming language of your choice with our API to automate your trades.
